Summarize "Motivation 3.0: How to motivate people to stay motivated!" How to Motivate People to Keep Going".
isbn: 978-4062144490

"Motivation 3.0: How to Motivate People to Keep Going" by Hirotaka Takeuchi and Norihiko Shimizu explores the concept of intrinsic motivation and how it can be used to keep people motivated in the long-term. The book emphasizes the importance of autonomy, mastery, and purpose in motivating individuals and offers practical advice on how to create an environment that fosters these elements. It also discusses the role of leaders in creating a culture of motivation and provides case studies of successful organizations that have implemented these principles. Overall, the book offers a fresh perspective on motivation and provides actionable insights for individuals and organizations looking to improve their motivational strategies.
